Extensions/String.html#/s:SS5ShellE12she.name: shellEscaped()
Extensions/String.html#/s:SS5ShellE12she.abstract: Creates a shell escaped string. If the string does not need escaping, returns the original string.

Extensions/String.html#/s:SS5ShellE11she.name: shellEscape()
Extensions/String.html#/s:SS5ShellE11she.abstract: Shell escapes the current string. This method is mutating version of shellEscaped().

Classes/Shell.html#/s:5ShellAAC16lookupE.name: lookupExecutable(_:)
Classes/Shell.html#/s:5ShellAAC16lookupE.abstract: Looks up an executable with the given name and returns its path if it was found.

Classes/Shell.html#/s:5ShellAAC4syncy6Re.name: sync(_:)
Classes/Shell.html#/s:5ShellAAC4syncy6Re.abstract: Runs a given command and returns its result synchronously.

Classes/Shell.html#/s:5ShellAAC4sync_30s.name: sync(_:shouldBeTerminatedOnParentExit:workingDirectoryPath:env:onStdout:onStderr:)
Classes/Shell.html#/s:5ShellAAC4sync_30s.abstract: Runs a given command and returns its result synchronously.

Classes/Shell.html#/s:5ShellAAC5async_12.name: async(_:onCompletion:)
Classes/Shell.html#/s:5ShellAAC5async_12.abstract: Runs a given command and notifies about its completion asynchronously.

Classes/Shell.html#/s:5ShellAAC5async_30.name: async(_:shouldBeTerminatedOnParentExit:workingDirectoryPath:env:onStdout:onStderr:onCompletion:)
Classes/Shell.html#/s:5ShellAAC5async_30.abstract: Runs a given command and notifies about its completion asynchronously.

Classes/Shell.html#/s:5ShellAAC7capturey.name: capture(_:)
Classes/Shell.html#/s:5ShellAAC7capturey.abstract: Runs the given command and returns the captured output.

Classes/Shell.html#/s:5ShellAAC7capture_.name: capture(_:workingDirectoryPath:env:)
Classes/Shell.html#/s:5ShellAAC7capture_.abstract: Runs the given command and returns the captured output.

Classes/Shell.html.name: Shell
Classes/Shell.html.abstract: Class tu run commands in the system.
